product_name: Timex Ironman 30-Lap Fast Wrap Watch - Men's
long_description: The Timex Ironman 30-Lap Fast Wrap watch has triathlon-ready features built into a durable, triathlon-worthy design. Oversize digits are easily read at a glance, even as you run. Features 100 hr. chronograph with lap or split option; 30-lap memory recall; 24 hr. countdown timer with stop and repeat capabilities. Includes 2 time zones, plus daily, weekday and weekend alarms with 5-minute backup. Indiglo(R) lighting lets you check the display in low light with the touch of a button. Nylon band with rip-and-stick closure allows for a fast, comfortable fit without the need of buckles. The Timex Ironman 30-Lap Fast Wrap watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Ironman 30-Lap Fast Wrap watch has triathlon-ready features built into a durable, triathlon-worthy design.
